name: Future Rally (KoodiPelto)
description:
I have been working on a racing game for PC with unity during my free time this summer. It is my first game (that I will actually finish). In it you race trough track for 3 laps alone or against AI.

This is first playable version and I plan to keep working on it. Plan is to add more maps, ships and some sort of campaign.

Currently it has only one map and ship.  Also it keeps track of your top times.

Any feedback would be great.
